item.title: Azoria Project Archive
item.description: The Azoria Project Archive is a collection of original documents and publications generated from fieldwork and research of the Azoria Project, an excavation of the Department of Classics and the Research Laboratories of Archaeology at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill.

item.title: African American Performance Art Archive
item.description: The African American Performance Art Archive (aapaa.org) makes crucial documentation of historically significant performances by African American artists available on-line to artists, scholars, and students in the spirit of intellectual exchange.

item.title: Electronic Theses and Dissertations
item.description: The Graduate School at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill began to accept dissertations and theses electronically for graduation in the spring of 2006. This collection includes electronically submitted Theses and Dissertation from May 2006 through May 2010.

item.title: Department of History Digital Photos, 2005-2010
item.description: Digital photographs documenting events held by the Department of History.
